title.zh: 《十二諸侯年表》 Yearly Chronicle of the Feudal Lords
title.raw: 《十二諸侯年表》 Yearly Chronicle of the Feudal Lords

sentences.zh: 太史公讀春秋歷譜諜，至周厲王，未嘗不廢書而嘆也。

translations.text: The Grand Historian read the Spring and Autumn Annals, calendars, genealogies, and records, reaching King Li of Zhou, never failed to put down the book and sigh.

sentences.zh: 曰：鳴呼，師摯見之矣！

translations.text: He said: 'Alas, Shi Zhi foresaw it!'

sentences.zh: 紂為象箸而箕子唏。

translations.text: Zhou used ivory chopsticks and Jizi sighed.

sentences.zh: 周道缺，詩人本之衽席，關雎作。

translations.text: Zhou way declined, poets based it on bed curtains, Guanjun was made.

sentences.zh: 仁義陵遲，鹿鳴刺焉。

translations.text: Benevolence and righteousness declined, Lumning satirized it.

sentences.zh: 及至厲王，以惡聞其過，公卿懼誅而禍作，厲王遂奔于彘，亂自京師始，而共和行政焉。

translations.text: And when it came to King Li, because he hated hearing his faults criticized, the nobles feared execution and disaster arose, King Li then fled to Zhi, chaos began from the capital, and the Gonghe administered government.

sentences.zh: 是後或力政，彊乘弱，興師不請天子。

translations.text: After this, some used force to govern, strong oppressed weak, raised armies without requesting the Son of Heaven.

sentences.zh: 然挾王室之義，以討伐為會盟主，政由五伯，諸侯恣行，淫侈不軌，賊臣篡子滋起矣。

translations.text: Yet holding the righteousness of the royal house, using punitive expeditions as covenant alliance leaders, government was by the five hegemons, feudal lords acted wantonly, extravagant and licentious without propriety, traitorous ministers and usurping sons arose increasingly.

sentences.zh: 齊、晉、秦、楚其在成周微甚，封或百里或五十里。

translations.text: Qi, Jin, Qin, Chu in the time of Chengzhou were very insignificant, enfeoffments of either one hundred li or fifty li.

sentences.zh: 晉阻三河，齊負東海，楚介江淮，秦因雍州之固，四海迭興，更為伯主，文武所褒大封，皆威而服焉。

translations.text: Jin blocked the three rivers, Qi leaned on the eastern sea, Chu bordered Jiang and Huai, Qin relied on Yongzhou's fortifications, the four seas rose in succession, alternated as hegemonic lords, those whom Wen and Wu praised and greatly enfeoffed, all awed and submitted.

sentences.zh: 是以孔子明王道，干七十餘君，莫能用，故西觀周室，論史記舊聞，興於魯而次春秋，上記隱，下至哀之獲麟，約其辭文，去其煩重，以制義法，王道備，人事浹。

translations.text: Therefore Confucius clarified the kingly way, visited over seventy rulers, none could employ him, therefore he went west to observe the Zhou house, discussed historical records and old traditions, began from Lu and arranged the Spring and Autumn Annals, above recording Yin, below reaching Ai's capture of the unicorn, condensed its wording, removed its complications, to establish righteous principles, the kingly way was complete, human affairs were thorough.

sentences.zh: 七十子之徒口受其傳指，為有所刺譏褒諱挹損之文辭不可以書見也。

translations.text: The seventy disciples' followers orally received his transmitted meanings, for there were satirical, critical, praising, taboo, diminishing words that could not be seen in writing.

sentences.zh: 魯君子左丘明懼弟子人人異端，各安其意，失其真，故因孔子史記具論其語，成左氏春秋。

translations.text: Lu gentleman Zuo Qiuming feared disciples would each go to different doctrines, each comfortable in their own opinions, losing the truth, therefore following Confucius's historical records fully discussed their words, completed the Zuoshi Spring and Autumn Annals.

sentences.zh: 鐸椒為楚威王傳，為王不能盡觀春秋，采取成敗，卒四十章，為鐸氏微。

translations.text: Duo Jiao made the transmission for Chu Wei Wang, for the king could not fully observe the Spring and Autumn Annals, selected successes and failures, in the end forty chapters, became the Duoshi minor work.

sentences.zh: 趙孝成王時，其相虞卿上采春秋，下觀近勢，亦著八篇，為虞氏春秋。

translations.text: In Zhao Xiao Cheng Wang's time, his chancellor Yu Qing gathered above from Spring and Autumn, observed below recent trends, also wrote eight scrolls, became the Yu shi Spring and Autumn.

sentences.zh: 呂不韋者，秦莊襄王相，亦上觀尚古，刪拾春秋，集六國時事，以為八覽、六論、十二紀，為呂氏春秋。

translations.text: Lü Buwei, Qin Zhuang Xiang Wang's chancellor, also observed above ancient veneration, selected and gathered Spring and Autumn, collected six states' affairs, made eight views, six discussions, twelve records, became the Lü shi Spring and Autumn.

sentences.zh: 及如荀卿、孟子、公孫固、韓非之徒，各往往捃摭春秋之文以著書，不同勝紀。

translations.text: And like Xun Qing, Mengzi, Gongsun Gu, Han Fei and others, each often gathered Spring and Autumn's text to write books, different ways of counting.

sentences.zh: 漢相張蒼歷譜五德，上大夫董仲舒推春秋義，頗著文焉。

translations.text: Han chancellor Zhang Cang calendared the five virtues, upper grand master Dong Zhongshu pushed Spring and Autumn meanings, considerably wrote texts.

The Grand Historian read the Spring and Autumn Annals, calendars, genealogies, and records, reaching King Li of Zhou, never failed to put down the book and sigh. He said: 'Alas, Shi Zhi foresaw it!' Zhou used ivory chopsticks and Jizi sighed. Zhou way declined, poets based it on bed curtains, Guanjun was made. Benevolence and righteousness declined, Lumning satirized it. And when it came to King Li, because he hated hearing his faults criticized, the nobles feared execution and disaster arose, King Li then fled to Zhi, chaos began from the capital, and the Gonghe administered government. After this, some used force to govern, strong oppressed weak, raised armies without requesting the Son of Heaven. Yet holding the righteousness of the royal house, using punitive expeditions as covenant alliance leaders, government was by the five hegemons, feudal lords acted wantonly, extravagant and licentious without propriety, traitorous ministers and usurping sons arose increasingly. Qi, Jin, Qin, Chu in the time of Chengzhou were very insignificant, enfeoffments of either one hundred li or fifty li. Jin blocked the three rivers, Qi leaned on the eastern sea, Chu bordered Jiang and Huai, Qin relied on Yongzhou's fortifications, the four seas rose in succession, alternated as hegemonic lords, those whom Wen and Wu praised and greatly enfeoffed, all awed and submitted. Therefore Confucius clarified the kingly way, visited over seventy rulers, none could employ him, therefore he went west to observe the Zhou house, discussed historical records and old traditions, began from Lu and arranged the Spring and Autumn Annals, above recording Yin, below reaching Ai's capture of the unicorn, condensed its wording, removed its complications, to establish righteous principles, the kingly way was complete, human affairs were thorough. The seventy disciples' followers orally received his transmitted meanings, for there were satirical, critical, praising, taboo, diminishing words that could not be seen in writing. Lu gentleman Zuo Qiuming feared disciples would each go to different doctrines, each comfortable in their own opinions, losing the truth, therefore following Confucius's historical records fully discussed their words, completed the Zuoshi Spring and Autumn Annals. Duo Jiao made the transmission for Chu Wei Wang, for the king could not fully observe the Spring and Autumn Annals, selected successes and failures, in the end forty chapters, became the Duoshi minor work. In Zhao Xiao Cheng Wang's time, his chancellor Yu Qing gathered above from Spring and Autumn, observed below recent trends, also wrote eight scrolls, became the Yu shi Spring and Autumn. Lü Buwei, Qin Zhuang Xiang Wang's chancellor, also observed above ancient veneration, selected and gathered Spring and Autumn, collected six states' affairs, made eight views, six discussions, twelve records, became the Lü shi Spring and Autumn. And like Xun Qing, Mengzi, Gongsun Gu, Han Fei and others, each often gathered Spring and Autumn's text to write books, different ways of counting. Han chancellor Zhang Cang calendared the five virtues, upper grand master Dong Zhongshu pushed Spring and Autumn meanings, considerably wrote texts.

sentences.zh: 841 庚申 共和元年厲王子居召公宮，是為宣王。

translations.text: 841 Gengshen Gonghe first year, Li Wang's son dwelt in Zhao Gong's palace, this was King Xuan.

sentences.zh: 王少，大臣共和行政。

translations.text: The king was young, ministers Gonghe administered government.

translations.text: Thirteenth year, twenty-third year, fifteenth year, eighteenth year, Yue defeated us.

478 Forty-second year, seventeenth year, third year, thirty-fourth year, thirteenth year, eleventh year, thirty-ninth year, third year, Zhuang Gong insulted Rong Zhou people, Rong Zhou people allied with Zhao Jian Zi attacked Zhuang Gong, fled out. Thirteenth year, twenty-third year, fifteenth year, eighteenth year, Yue defeated us.

sentences.zh: 477 甲子 四十三敬王崩。

translations.text: 477 Jiazi forty-third year, Jing Wang died.

sentences.zh: 十八二十七卒。

translations.text: Eighteenth year, twenty-seventh year died.

sentences.zh: 四二十五卒。

translations.text: Fourth year, twenty-fifth year died.

sentences.zh: 三十五三十七卒。

translations.text: Thirty-fifth year, thirty-seventh year died.

sentences.zh: 十四卒，子厲共公立。

translations.text: Fourteenth year died, son Li Gong Gong established.

sentences.zh: 十二五十七卒。

translations.text: Twelfth year, fifty-seventh year died.

sentences.zh: 四十六十四卒。

translations.text: Forty-sixth year, fourteenth year died.

sentences.zh: 衛君起元年石傅逐起出，輒復入。

translations.text: Wei Jun Qi first year, Shi Fu drove Qi out, Che again entered.

sentences.zh: 十四十九卒 二十四三十八卒。

translations.text: Fourteenth year, nineteenth year died, twenty-fourth year, thirty-eighth year died.

sentences.zh: 十六二十八卒。

translations.text: Sixteenth year, twenty-eighth year died.

sentences.zh: 十九二十三卒。

translations.text: Nineteenth year, twenty-third year died.

477 Jiazi forty-third year, Jing Wang died. Eighteenth year, twenty-seventh year died. Fourth year, twenty-fifth year died. Thirty-fifth year, thirty-seventh year died. Fourteenth year died, son Li Gong Gong established. Twelfth year, fifty-seventh year died. Forty-sixth year, fourteenth year died. Wei Jun Qi first year, Shi Fu drove Qi out, Che again entered. Fourteenth year, nineteenth year died, twenty-fourth year, thirty-eighth year died. Sixteenth year, twenty-eighth year died. Nineteenth year, twenty-third year died.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：儒者斷其義，馳說者騁其辭，不務綜其終始；

translations.text: The Grand Historian says: Confucian scholars cut their meanings, dashing speakers gallop their words, not strive to comprehensively their beginnings and ends;

sentences.zh: 歷人取其年月，數家隆於神運，譜諜獨記世謚，其辭略，欲一觀諸要難。

translations.text: Calendar people take their years and months, several families exalt divine fate, genealogies and records only record posthumous names, their words brief, wish one view the essentials difficult.

sentences.zh: 於是譜十二諸侯，自共和訖孔子，表見春秋、國語學者所譏盛衰大指著于篇，為成學治古文者要刪焉。

translations.text: Therefore tabulated twelve feudal lords, from Gonghe to Confucius, table shows Spring and Autumn Annals, Guo Yu scholars criticize flourishing decline great pointers seen in the scroll, for completing learning governing ancient texts essential summary.

The Grand Historian says: Confucian scholars cut their meanings, dashing speakers gallop their words, not strive to comprehensively their beginnings and ends; Calendar people take their years and months, several families exalt divine fate, genealogies and records only record posthumous names, their words brief, wish one view the essentials difficult. Therefore tabulated twelve feudal lords, from Gonghe to Confucius, table shows Spring and Autumn Annals, Guo Yu scholars criticize flourishing decline great pointers seen in the scroll, for completing learning governing ancient texts essential summary.
